resources.string: Cut off for low probability emission
io error - could not copy database
Gamma energy library. Search for lines within an energy span or for information on a nuclide.\n\nSource code on https://github.com/sickel/nuclib

Data from https://www.cpp.edu/~pbsiegel/bio431/genergies.html (pbsiegel) and https://www-nds.iaea.org/xgamma_standards/genergies1.htm (IAEA). Where data are.available from both sources, IAEA data have been used.\n\nDeveloped in aide, https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aide.ui.
(c) Morten Sickel 2016 licenced under GPL v2 or later

Type in an energy in keV and an uncertainty in percent or keV (default 5percent) or type in an energy span directly. 

Check "low probability" to search and display lines with low probability (default, p<0.01).
 Type in a halflife to limit the search to nuclides with a longer half life.
 Tap a nuclide in the search results to get more information.
